original_request: Refactor the dashboard interface to look more like a code IDE (Visual Studio, JetBrains IntelliJ). Maintain all existing features while creating a comprehensive plan with wireframes.

decisions.decision: Use VS Code-style 3-region layout (Activity Bar | Sidebar | Editor | Panel)
decisions.rationale: Industry standard for developer tools, familiar mental model

decisions.decision: IBM Plex Sans as global font family, IBM Plex Mono for code
decisions.rationale: User preference, excellent readability at small sizes

decisions.decision: Modular JavaScript architecture with dedicated modules per component
CSS Grid for main layout, Flexbox for components
decisions.rationale: Modern layout capabilities, good browser support

decisions.decision: Activity Bar positioned on RIGHT side
decisions.rationale: User preference, differs from VS Code default

decisions.decision: Bottom panel visible by default on load
decisions.rationale: User preference, immediate visibility of activity/tasks
User preference, power user workflow support

decisions.decision: Mobile responsive layout is HIGH priority
decisions.rationale: User requirement, important for mobile access
